content.description: The number of states in the world has grown to approximately 200. The creation of new countries has been possible as a result of devolutionary forces. Countries such as Spain and Nigeria face devolutionary pressures.
content.question:
A. Define devolution.

B. Describe how each of the following forces contributes to devolutionary pressures within a country.

1. Cultural diversity

2. Regional economic differences

3. Physical geography and territorial size

C. Identify and explain ONE political impact resulting from devolutionary pressures related to cultural differences in either Spain or Nigeria.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
